panels.visual: Mephits pausing, considering Aggressive stances softening **Caption:** "DC 15 NATURE - 20!"
panels.prompt:
Professional comic book panel illustration.

Location: The Elven Sanctum - hidden cavern deep beneath citadel. Massive central chamber with the Orrery at center - enormous magical device with rotating crystal spheres, glowing runes, clicking gears. Ancient high elven architecture - carved pillars, vaulted ceiling with constellation maps. Five alcoves housing True Lenses for elemental essences. Magical energy crackling through air. Sense of ancient power and sacrifice. Ruins of century-old battle visible. Medieval high fantasy sanctum.


Scene: Mephits pausing, considering Aggressive stances softening **Caption:** "DC 15 NATURE - 20!"

Style: Bold ink line art, vibrant colors, dynamic composition, sequential art style, graphic novel quality, medieval fantasy setting, high fantasy atmosphere.

panels.visual: Verdant Mephit turning fully on Alric Thorny vines wrapping him **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOSH-WRAP!"

characters.Verdant Mephit: Size: Small elemental (2-3 feet) Form: Living vines and thorny brambles given shape Eyes: Glowing green pinpoints of light
